txt.en: Now that you have been entered into the pit-fighting tournament, you should show these Orcs what you can do!

'More scraps to be coming any time now. Do not worry about poor Párgrub. You, err, amaze me with all your fighting and winning. How do you do it? Good thing there's one more day of fighting, otherwise Párgrub, err never mind.'

'You ready for another fight? No need for Párgrub's scrap armour now that they know you as a [placeholder]. You know this fight will be harder? Párgrub, err, knows you can pull through though. Yes, that's it.'
Párgrub can be found near Thorzhaf.\n\nYou should speak with Párgrub about the match.

'You ready for another fight? No need for Párgrub's scrap armour now that they know you as an [placeholder]. You know this fight will be harder? Párgrub, err, knows you can pull through though. Yes, that's it.'
'Are you ready to fight for Párgrub again?'
